snippet.title: "There's Always a Madman: Fight or Flight" Release Date Trailer
snippet.description: The spy thriller interactive novel video game "There's Always a Madman: Fight or Flight" releases on Steam March 22, 2024 (i.e. one week later than the date at the end of the trailer shows).  Wishlist and play the free demo now right here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2390500/Theres_Always_a_Madman_Fight_or_Flight
